title: MyFlowerAI Personal Fit Schema v1.0
description: Schema for PRIVATE per-user personal fit tracking. This data tracks how well a specific strain works for an individual user. This data MUST be stored in per-user private storage (Supabase with RLS, local encrypted, or private namespace). NEVER commit personal fit data to public repository or strain JSON files.

personal_fit_id.description: Unique identifier for this personal fit record (UUID recommended)

strain_id.description: Reference to public strain data ID

storage_location.description: Where this personal fit data is stored

user_consent.description: Whether user has consented to personal fit tracking

rating_1to10.description: User's overall rating of how well this strain works for them (1 = not good, 10 = perfect fit)

best_for.description: User's personal tags for what this strain works best for them (e.g., 'morning creativity', 'evening relaxation', 'social events')

avoid_for.description: User's personal tags for situations to avoid this strain (e.g., 'work meetings', 'mornings', 'when anxious')

repeat_probability_0to1.description: Probability that user would use this strain again (0 = never, 1 = definitely)

notes.description: Freeform personal notes about fit and preferences

created_at.description: When this personal fit record was created (ISO 8601)

updated_at.description: When this personal fit record was last updated (ISO 8601)
